divs: Sighting DetailsAs I was walking to the cashier with my mother, My mom started to buy the flowers for our yard the cashier said to my mom you need two pots of the flowers because they all come together. So my mom goes to get the flowers as I stand 2 feet away from the cashier and I see a Cessna plane cause I know my aircraft,The Cessna goes over my head to the east and it goes straight and then it makes a left turn a few seconds later it turns right to the airport and the airport was not far from where it was turning and as it made a same turn,I saw something a few inches away from the plane like it was a plane but it was not a plane it was a little black circler object moving south right next to the plane and then it disappears. I was excited when I saw it,It was my third sighting of a UFO it was fun.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Hillsborough
There were no other sightings in Hillsborough on or around May 12th 2011
Summary: UFO close by a Cessna plane
